entry.title: New version of Pwman3 released (v0.9)
entry.content: Yesterday night I released a new version of my CLI password manager Pwman3. This is a major mile stone, with huge amount of changes and improvements. Read more to find about what changed, and what I learned writing this version. continue reading...

entry.title: New version of Pwman3 released
entry.content: I finally managed to release a new version of pwman3, the console and network password manager. Read more about it here. continue reading...

entry.title: Git tip - git describe
entry.content: Earlier I posted a tip how to count commits between tags, this post suggests a better way to do it continue reading...

entry.title: Git tip - Count commits between tags
entry.content: Once every N commits I would like to release a new version of pwman3, so here is how to keep a track of this number between releases ... continue reading...
